name: Duplica 3D - Match Puzzle
description:
Take a trip down memory lane into the world of matching fun with Duplica, an all-new match pairs game.

Sort and match all the 3D object pairs to clear the screen before the timer runs out, and win. It’s a game so simple, but so addictively fun — you won’t be able to put it down!

Move through the map by completing unique and challenging puzzles. Uncover new themes, landscapes, objects and rewards along the way.
Sharpen your brain and become the match master, as you sort through the 3D objects trying to find a match — with the timer ticking.

Game Highlights:
□ Amazing tactile game experience — drag, swipe and toss items around the screen
□ Play hundreds of fun and challenging match 3d object games
□ Phone and tablet optimised: a beautifully designed game to fit your device
□ Playable offline so you can enjoy the game anywhere
□ Auto-save so you can always take a break from tough levels
□ A game that can be enjoyed by all ages!

How to Play:
□ Drag objects around to sort and find the ones you want.
□ Drag matching objects onto the hexagon to clear them.
□ Clear all the objects within the allocated time limit to win the game.
□ Make several quick consecutive matches to get a combo bonus.
□ Move along the map to discover new themes, objects, terrains and rewards!
